modName: Lock-On - LOZ Ocarina of Time Cursor (No Auto-Target option)
descriptionHtml:
OK!

So this is NOT my original mod! This was originally a mod by himika. I saw in the comments someone thought it would be a good idea to replace the cursor with Ocarina of Time's lock on cursor.

AND HOW WAS I NOT GOING TO DO THAT?!

I hope everyone enjoys! :D

I've also added an option with a tampered Auto-Target so it's gone essentially. Myself and a lot of people complained how it would annoyingly jump to another person while walking without the darn thing even turned on. I will try to fix the original so it has the fixed version when I have more time.

Original Mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33791/
author: mitchanlagen
